title: Boards Font Color Meaning
body: I've noticed that some peoples posts show up in yellowish font while other peoples font shows up as white... why is this?

replies.body: Sigh I tried looking through the source... its a mess no clear pointer to which style sheet they are using... where its imported... huge lack of comments 0.0 the tabbing is good though... so ya ^.^ over my patience level or its in the php ^.^ unless its the first one i came to that is all 1 line and incredibly hard to read ^.^ ya...

1>.> That is quite odd... Thanks for the reply. So should I assume its some form of CSS or javascript glitch =\ somewhere the code is calling for color: white and is calling for collor: yellowish*. The yellowish color is prolly lower on the list but the javascript (maybe php) is prolly throwing in the white... so sometimes it replies to the script first over the style sheet... >.> which in turn means both a browser bug and a boards bug at the same time >.> Very cool ^.^
